content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.23684210526315788, 2.710526315789474)
Consists of steam engine (position not specified), boiler (position not specified), and offshore pump (position not specified). The electricity generator is currently not plugged into the electric network.

### Copper plate mine at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0).
- The stone furnace is currently out of ingredients.

### Iron plate mine at position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position (5.0, 5.0).
- The stone furnace is currently out of ingredients.

### Laboratory at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of a lab at position (2.5, 1.5). The lab is currently without power.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing boiler
- Ensure that a boiler is placed on the map before attempting to create an electricity generator.

### Errors when using electricity groups not plugged into the network
- Confirm that all electricity groups are properly connected to the electric network to avoid power issues.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Check that all furnaces and other crafting entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to operate them.

### Errors when lab has no power
- Make sure that the lab is connected to a power source to enable its functionality.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
